*Registration for this workshop is now closed*.

If you missed it, but would like to attend a future workshop, please
reach out to [Eliot](../bios/community/aaaeliot.qmd) or
[Ceres](../bios/community/aaaeliot.qmd) so that we can add you to the
wait list.

## Date: June 11 - 13, 2024

## Location: Virtual with MS Teams

Meeting link will be e-mailed to all workshop participants.

## Agenda

"WOYO", Work On Your Own + health breaks

In each session you will have time to work through the examples and take
breaks. The last 15min of each WOYO will be with "open video and chat"
to ask questions and discuss as a group.
